modName: Duplicate Items - GO TO VIDEOS TAB
descriptionHtml: This short tutorial will show you how to duplicate an item in Skyrim!You can just read this on how to duplicate instead of watching the video if you want to:1. Open Skyrim.2. Open your inventory and locate the item(s) that you want to duplicate.3. Close your inventory and find a storage container (ex. Chest, Large Sack, Small Sack, Barrel, Strongbox, Wardrobe, Cupboard, Urn, Burial Urn, Pod, etc.)4. The storage container should preferably be empty when you do your duplication. It does not have to be, but note that whatever is in the storage container WILL BE DUPLICATED5. Place the item(s) you wish to duplicate into the storage container.6. Exit the inventory of the storage container.7. Open the Console (console commands) by pressing the "~" key (should be located below the Escape Key.8. Click on the storage container you wish to duplicate the contained items of.9. Read the code and add it at the end of the duplicate command.10. type this: "duplicateallitems xxxxxxxxx" the x's will be replaced by the code given when you click the storage container.11. Press "Enter"12. Open the storage container and the items will be duplicated!NOTE: YOU HAVE TO KEEP THE STORAGE CONTAINER SELECTED OR DUPLICATION WILL FAIL.
author: soundspeed757
